title: Best of The Herd: 11/08/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/08/2018
description:
Colin is impressed with how good LeBron and the Lakers are playing after just 11 games considering how bad some of the other teams LeBron contemplated joining are doing. He thinks the Eagles are ready to absolutely crush the Cowboys on Sunday night. Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films explains to Colin how Dez Bryant will fit in with the Saints and why Cam Newton has been so good this year. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
